bike.description: Specialized M4 fully manipulated alloy frame, fully butted, ORE DT, asymmetrical seat stays, forged dropouts w/ replaceable derailleur hanger, disc only

components.description: Rock Shox Reba SL, Dual Air, 80/100mm travel, 1 piece magnesium lower, 32mm alloy stanchions, alloy steerer, Motion Control damper, rebound adj. w/ LO, disc only
1-1/8" threadless, Campy style semi-cartridge bearings
3D forged alloy, reverse 4-bolt, 7 degree rise, 31.8mm clamp
Butted alloy riserbar, 25mm rise, 660mm wide, 8 degree back sweep, 6 degree up sweep
Specialized Enduro, dual compound Kraton, no flange, 131mm
Avid Elixir 4 hydraulic disc, alloy backed organic pads, 160mm G3 Clean Sweep rotor
Avid Elixir 4 hydraulic disc, alloy backed organic pads, 160mm G3 Clean Sweep rotor
Avid Elixir 4
Shimano Deore, 34.9mm clamp, top swing, bottom pull
Shimano RD-M772 Deore XT Shadow, long cage
Shimano SL-590 Deore trigger
Shimano HG50, 9-speed, 11-34t
KMC X9SL w/ reuseable Missing Link
Shimano FC-M532, 2-piece crank
44A x 32S x 22S replaceable
Shimano FC-M532, integrated outboard bearing design for 2-piece crank
Alloy body and cage, 9/16"
DT-Swiss 445D, 26", alloy double wall disc, pin joint, eyelets, 28h front and 32h rear
Forged alloy, hi/low flange, sealed cartridge bearing, machined disc mount, 28h
Forged alloy, double sealed cartridge bearing, machined disc mount, cassette, QR, 32h
2mm (14g) stainless
Specialized Fast Trak LK Control, 26x2.0", 60TPI, tubeless ready aramid bead
Specialized Fast Trak LK Control, 26x2.0", 60TPI, tubeless ready aramid bead
Schraeder valve
Specialized Rockhopper XC, Body Geometry, hollow Cr-Mo rails, 143mm width, front and rear bumpers
